title: USS Nimitz 'Tic Tac' (2004)
summary: US Navy pilots from the USS Nimitz Carrier Strike Group encountered a white, Tic Tac-shaped object with unusual acceleration and flight behavior.

claims.text: Object showed rapid acceleration beyond known aircraft performance.
claims.evidence: ATFLIR data, pilot testimony, radar tracks.

editorsNotesHtml: This case helped kick off modern mainstream interest. Strong witnesses and instrument data, but incomplete sensor records keep it unresolved.
